GameData.LocalizedText:
Helena
Experienced the attack on Pearl Harbor, participated in the Battle of Guadalcanal, and finally heroically sank in Kula Gulf. Helena, you are melancholy and mature, with a brave heart beneath your weak exterior, and SG radar is your most powerful tool. In the face of danger, use the power in your hands and don't let the tragedy you experienced happen again.
Helena, who owns SG's new radar, has insight into everything she encounters, and she is the master of intelligence
SG's new radar can be described as a magic weapon. With its blessing, Helena has a high diplomatic visibility, spies have a high success rate of operations, and enemy espionage activities in the country are vigorously suppressed. As a result, her unit has a wide field of view and can reduce the Combat Strength of adjacent enemies by a large [ICON_Strength]. Building a city on the coast, "Dream of Kura Gulf" will bring considerable output to it, making it a city of culture. Using intelligence superiority and broad vision to monitor the enemy's movements at all times, Helena's land will be untouched, and the peace brought will become a strong guarantee for Helena to achieve Culture victory and Science victory.
USS Helena CL50 is the Brooklyn-class light cruiser No. 9 (St. Louis-class No. 2) of the United States Navy. The two ships of this class were originally Brooklyn-class ships No. 8 and No. 9, which were separately equipped with improved high-pressure boilers and higher firepower, so they were divided into separate classes. Construction began on December 9, 1936, and was launched at the New York Navy Yard on August 27, 1938, and the ceremony was presided over by the launch ceremony of Montana Senator Thomas M. Smith. Eleanor Carlisle Goger, granddaughter of J. Welch. It was commissioned on 18 September 1939 with its first captain being Captain Max A. B. Dermott. After her service, Helena was assigned to the Pacific Fleet and was attached to the 9th Cruiser Detachment under the command of Rear Admiral H. Fellacus Leary.
Due to the serious damage suffered in the attack on Pearl Harbor, repairs were carried out, and the latest SG radar was added to the repair, which also became the basis for the ship.
The ship played a key role in the Battle of Cape Esperance and the Battle of Guadalcanal. And at the Battle of Kula Bay on July 6, 1943, Helena's radar picked up the Japanese formation, giving the fleet a head start. Helena and Honolulu, St. Louis shells very accurately hit the Japanese cover team belonging to the Niizuki, Ryoukaze, Tanikaze 3 destroyers, Niizuki was lost, Ryoukaze front main gun shot, machine gun ammunition box fire, the hull of a number of places were pierced; Tanikaze anchor chain compartment was hit by a bullet, fortunately did not explode, the food compartments into the water. But as Helena did not use flameless powder, the dazzling muzzle fire exposed herself. In the night, the two ships, Ryoukaze and Tanikaze, which were still able to fight, fired 16 torpedoes in unison, using the flash of her fire as an aiming point. 7 minutes later, she was struck by three torpedoes fired by the Japanese, first by one torpedo that hit the bow of the ship and snapped it off, and then by two torpedoes that hit the middle of the ship and caused the hull to rip apart, breaking it into two and sinking it in a very short period of time.
Due to the outstanding performance of the Helena, the ship became the first ship to receive a collective commendation from the Admiralty, and in her short career received the Asia-Pacific Medal of Combat Merit and 7 War Stars.
If only my ability to ask for enemies could help my sisters...
Memories of Pearl Harbor
Live as much as possible in harmony with other civilizations. Hates civilizations who backstab and declare surprise wars.
(You are her friend)
Helena loves people who are friendly with Helena
(You declared a surprise war)
Helena hated people who declared surprise wars
The Wonder of Kula Gulf
Has 4 level of [ICON_VisLimited] Diplomatic Visibility greater than normal with every civilization that she's met. Enemy Spy level reduced by 4 in her lands. Her Spy level is increased by 4 for offensive operations. Plots adjacent to the Coast and Lake provide +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +1 [ICON_Production] Production. The Coast and Lake +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith and provides standard adjacent bonuses and +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture for adjacent Districts. +2 sight for all units, which the sight is not obstructed by Terrains and Features and give their adjacent enemy units -4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength. Gain the St. Louis-class Light Cruiser unique unit when the Combustion technology is researched.

The Wonder of Kula Gulf provides +2 Sight, The sight is not obstructed by Terrains and Features. Makes adjacent enemy units -4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength
SG Radar
{Property} [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when adjacent to enemy units
St. Louis-class Light Cruiser
Helena unique Modern era naval unit with a high field of view and powerful air defense, it can perform long-range attacks with a range of 2 and expose the position of naval raiders in line of sight.
The St. Louis-class light cruisers should actually belong to the Brooklyn-class light cruisers - the last two were built to replace the first Omaha-class light cruisers and used an improved design that could be called the St. Louis-class, including a staggered power layout with a new, more compact boiler to improve survivability; The secondary guns were replaced by four twin 127 mm/38 Mk12 dual-purpose guns, mounted in the Mk29 mod.0 gun mount, and the aft superstructure and mast were located directly behind Chimney No. 2. During the overhaul, the No. 3 ship Savannah modified four twin 127mm/38 Mk12 high-level dual-purpose guns in a layout similar to the St. Louis class, mounted on the Mk32 gun mount. But the rear superstructure still retains the characteristics of the first 7 Brooklyn-class ships.
The Brooklyn-class light cruisers were light cruisers built by the United States Navy before World War II. Equipped with five triple 152mm main battery turrets, it is the most powerful light cruiser in the U.S. Navy. There are 9 ships of the same class.
This class of ships is a product of the London Naval Treaty of 1930, according to which the United States also has a total of 30,000 tons of heavy cruisers and a total of three heavy cruisers, and strictly limits the construction and completion time of these three ships, so in fact cannot immediately form combat effectiveness. In order to cope with the expanding naval power of other countries, the United States had to turn to the construction of light cruisers equipped with 152mm, that is, 6-inch main guns, just at this time the Japanese Navy's topmost cruiser appeared, which far exceeded the performance of the old light cruisers and immediately became the benchmark of the British and American navies, and this class and the British city-class cruisers were also a response to the top class.
The main gun of the Brooklyn class is five triple Mk.16 152mm/47 naval guns, which can fire up to 23,881m at 47.5 degrees elevation angle, and can fire 8-10 rounds per minute, a total of 120-150 shells per minute, and the firepower even exceeds that of the previous heavy cruiser's multi-turret spirit, and the secondary gun is eight single-mounted 127mm/25 anti-aircraft guns. In addition, the class pioneered the use of a flat-deck ship type, and changed the design of previous heavy cruisers to place aviation facilities in the center of the ship, moving them to the stern: this would reduce the chance of serious damage caused by aviation fuel fires, but also increase the probability of aviation facilities being damaged by waves. This ship design has been used in subsequent cruisers such as the Cleveland class and the Baltimore class. Thus, the Brooklyn class is a landmark in the history of American cruiser construction.
I would love to have a real friend.
Asking for friendship is good, but your sincerity needs to be considered.
It turns out that you are a reliable person. Willing to accept my friendship? s
Thank you, I will cherish our relationship.
You rejected my kindness, it's okay, I won't give up.
It's war again, but I'm not going to let the tragedy happen again.
I long for peace, but peace is not a reason for me to give in to everything.
Your delegation has arrived safely and they conveyed your kindness to me.
Now is not the time, let's wait a while.
I will send a delegation to your country and I hope you will accept it.
You are a polite man, and I know very well that this condemnation is only a foreshadowing for your next war.
Others may not know about the evil deeds you committed, but I konw. (Condemn you)
Hello, I'm the Eagle Union light cruiser, Helena. Compared to my sisters, I have a stronger ability to find enemies. But, many times, one person alone cannot save everyone ... Ah, nothing, I was just talking to myself...
Would you like to visit a city near us?
Thank you for your generosity.
Do you and I not know enough about both sides and are willing to exchange information about the capital?
You are a fairly reliable friend, may there be no conflict between us.
You are a noteworthy leader, especially when it comes to military movements.
According to my observations, you will definitely become an excellent ally of the Eagle Union. I hereby request an alliance with you.
Don't forget, I know everything around me, not to mention such a huge army?
Even though I have such power now, has the tragedy played out again? I lost and there is no next time.
Thank you.
Such a deal is not good for you or me.
